entry.def: You can refer to someone such as an old soldier or politician who is still active and aggressive as a warhorse .

means.word_mean: 1. a work of art (composition or drama) that is part of the standard repertory but has become hackneyed from much repetition
2. an experienced person who has been through many battles; someone who has given long service
